description:
Nourish your landscape

The Tree & Landscape Plan is a comprehensive solution for the health and vitality of your entire landscape, from gardens to woody plants. This annual plan combines our Organic All Purpose Garden Fertilizer, ideal for flowers and veggie gardens, with the targeted nourishment of WonderFert Tree & Shrub for your trees and shrubs. The Sunday Organics Soil Booster enriches the soil across your property, promoting robust growth and plant hardiness.

sections.standard_annual_plan_highlights:
General plant health nutrition with 7-3-7 NPK (Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) Organic All-Purpose Garden Fertilizer
Specialized care for trees and shrubs with 6-3-4 NPK WonderFert Tree & Shrub
Improved soil health from Organic Soil Booster, rich in nutrients and microbes
Eco-friendly formulations for a sustainable approach to landscaping
Made for a variety of landscaping needs , including trees, shrubs, flowers, and vegetables
User-friendly , with a hose-end garden sprayer for easy application
Up to 500 sq. ft. coverage , perfect for small to medium-sized yards
sections.whats_included:
All-Purpose Organic Garden Fertilizer: Versatile nutrition for all landscaped plants
WonderFert Tree & Shrub: Tailored fertilizer for trees and shrubs, slow-release nitrogen for sustained growth
Sunday Organics Soil Booster Soil Amendment: Optimizes soil health and nutrient absorption
sections.instructions:
Apply the All-Purpose Organic Garden Fertilizer to flowers, vegetables, and general garden areas at the time of planting, as directed.
Attach the hose-end sprayer to Soil Boost and connect it to the hose. Apply Soil Booster to prepared soil or existing garden beds to enhance soil health throughout your landscape. Allow it to dry fully before applying anything else.
For trees and shrubs, apply WonderFert Tree & Shrub with the hose-end sprayer, ensuring deep-root nourishment.
Reapply products as needed, following individual product guidelines for optimal results.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How do annual plans work?
Sunday’s Veggie Garden Plan is a comprehensive kit in one simple shipment delivered annually.
Is this kit suitable for all types of landscapes?
Yes, our Tree & Landscape Kit is designed for a wide range of landscaping needs, from small gardens to large trees and shrubs.
How often should I use the products in the kit?
Follow the individual product instructions. Generally, apply the All-Purpose Organic Garden Fertilizer every 4-6 weeks, apply Soil Booster between fertilizer applications—up to once per week, and apply WonderFert Tree & Shrub as needed for up to 8 weeks of nourishment.
Are the products in this kit safe for all plants?
Soil Booster and All-Purpose Organic Garden Fertilizer are both designed for any plant in the garden or landscape. However, WonderFert Tree & Shrub is best suited for woody perennial plants like trees and shrubs!
